mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET ROOM_ID = #{roomId}, EMP_NO = #{empNo}, START_TIME = to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), END_TIME = to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE RESERV_ID = #{reservId}
mapper.select: SELECT RESERV_ID, ROOM_ID, A.EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, DESCRIPTION FROM RESERVATION A JOIN EMPLOYEES B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO ORDER BY RESERV_ID
SELECT RESERV_ID, ROOM_ID, EMP_NO, START_TIME, END_TIME, DESCRIPTION FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERV_ID = #{reservId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE START_TIME = #{startTime}
SELECT B.ROOM_NAME, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RESERVATION A INNER JOIN ROOM B ON A.ROOM_ID = B.ROOM_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY B.ROOM_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM RESERVATION WHERE END_TIME > TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND START_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND ROWNUM = 1
